summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal sewerage utility; authorizing the alteration and reconstruction of the sewage pumping plant at 53rd Avenue Southwest and Alki Avenue, together with necessary force mains and gravity sewers to connect said pumping plant with the sewage pumping plant at 63rd Avenue Southwest and Beach Drive, as a part of the additions, betterments and extensions to said utility contemplated by plan and system Ordinance No. 84391, and making an appropriation from the Sewer Fund therefor, as a advance to capital account.
